entry.summary: Re @TwitterSafety This is a critical distinction. Itâ€™s obviously trivial for a single person to create 10k bot accounts on one computer, each of which is tweeting slurs that are written to avoid text string detection. What matters is whether those tweets are actually shown to real users.
